definitions.definition: A severe pang or spasm of pain , especially one experienced when the uterus contracts during childbirth , or when a person is about to die .

subdefinitions.definition: ( usually in the plural ) The pain of labour or childbirth; the suffering of death .

definitions.definition: Any severe pang or spasm, especially an outburst of feeling ; a paroxysm .
( figuratively , usually in the plural ) A hard struggle , especially one associated with the beginning or finishing of a task .

main_definition: A severe pang or spasm of pain , especially one experienced when the uterus contracts during childbirth , or when a person is about to die .
secondary_definitions: Any severe pang or spasm, especially an outburst of feeling ; a paroxysm .
( figuratively , usually in the plural ) A hard struggle , especially one associated with the beginning or finishing of a task .

definitions.definition: Synonym of froe ( “ a cleaving tool for splitting cask staves and shingles from a block of wood ” ) .

main_definition: Synonym of froe ( “ a cleaving tool for splitting cask staves and shingles from a block of wood ” ) .
